description.value:
Requirements You're riding a megafauna companion that has a melee Strike.

You've trained your megafauna companion to stagger its enemies, impeding their ability to fight back. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Command an Animal] to order your megafauna companion to spend both its actions making a single, powerful Strike. The attack deals an extra die of weapon damage, and if the attack hits and deals damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.
